DOC.brief_summary: Patients knee arthroplasty usually perform spinal anesthesia single-shot femoral nerve block periarticular block , would like know plasma concentration bupivacaine patient .
DOC.brief_title: Plasma Concentrations Bupivacaine After Peri-articular Injection Total Knee Arthroplasty
DOC.criteria: age 3070 yr ASA III patient undergo total knee arthroplasty spinal block single shot femoral nerve block periarticular block patient 's refusal allergic bupivacaine body weight less 50 kg liver disease heart disease coagulopathy Hct < 35 % infection groin
